sys_soap_message_function.envelope: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:bsvc="urn:com.workday/bsvc"> <soapenv:Header> <bsvc:Workday_Common_Header> <!--Optional:--> <bsvc:Include_Reference_Descriptors_In_Response>${Workday_Common_Header.Include_Reference_Descriptors_In_Response}</bsvc:Include_Reference_Descriptors_In_Response> </bsvc:Workday_Common_Header> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <bsvc:Put_Preferred_Communication_Language_Request bsvc:version="${Put_Preferred_Communication_Language_Request}"> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <bsvc:Preferred_Communication_Languages> <!--Optional:--> <bsvc:Delete>${Preferred_Communication_Languages.Delete}</bsvc:Delete> <bsvc:Country_Reference bsvc:Descriptor="${Preferred_Communication_Languages.Country_Reference}"> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <bsvc:ID bsvc:type="${Country_Reference.ID}">${Country_Reference.ID}</bsvc:ID> </bsvc:Country_Reference> <bsvc:Preferred_Communication_Language_Data> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <bsvc:User_Language_Reference bsvc:Descriptor="${Preferred_Communication_Language_Data.User_Language_Reference}"> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <bsvc:ID bsvc:type="${User_Language_Reference.ID}">${User_Language_Reference.ID}</bsvc:ID> </bsvc:User_Language_Reference> <!--Optional:--> <bsvc:Inactive>${Preferred_Communication_Language_Data.Inactive}</bsvc:Inactive> </bsvc:Preferred_Communication_Language_Data> </bsvc:Preferred_Communication_Languages> </bsvc:Put_Preferred_Communication_Language_Request> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
